title: RHOBH: Rinterrogation
description:
It's the moment we've been waiting for on The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills: Rinna finally confronts Kathy. The truth finally comes out! All the controversy is not just about a conga line. It's about a conga line AND an insatiable desire to hear "Billie Jean." Does Kathy's depravity know no bounds??

What did you think about the big confrontation?

Be sure to check out our video recording of this recap here: https://www.patreon.com/posts/72647525?pr=true
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (benron)
